messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] parenting dilemas
messages.msgSnippet: ... We loved that book.  It s what my son always wanted to read, especially if the day had gone badly.  It s a major snuggle-book! I m sorry that somebody felt
messages.messageBody:
3/13/03 01:44:

> That's interesting. They must have changed the text of the book in the DVD.
> In the book, the mother, when asked by her daughter if she broke their eggs,
> or ran away etc., she responds by saying how she would feel (angry, sorry,
> surprised, sad,) but would still love her, forever, because she was her Dear
> One.

We loved that book. It's what my son always wanted to read, especially if
the day had gone badly. It's a major snuggle-book!

I'm sorry that somebody felt the need to make the DVD about obedience. How
sad.

brenda
